DOC.brief_summary: Gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) major health problem - grow prevalence obesity - old age pregnant woman A randomize control trial 54 pregnant voluntary woman high risk GDM . - feasibility early intervention - glucose tolerance week 26-28
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . A 75-g oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) perform week 8-12 1. voluntary woman early pregnancy ( n=96 ) 2 . 54 high risk mother randomize - lifestyle intervention group ( n=27 ) - close follow-up ( n=27 ) 2 . An OGTT perform week 26-28 - lifestyle intervention group ( n=27 ) - close follow-up group ( n=27 ) - high-risk woman early care group ( n=42 ) randomize 3 . An OGTT also perform week 26-28 two neighbor municipality - standard care high-risk group ( n=171 ) undergo early intervention 4 . Primary outcome - number risk participant develop GDM pregnancy two arm 5 . Secondary outcome - effect intervention fetal growth
DOC.criteria: high risk gestational diabetes fast glucose 4.85.5 mmol/l 2hour glucose OGTT < 7.8 mmol/l normal glucose tolerance week 812 gestational diabetes week 812
